title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
description: Tanjiro embarks on a journey to avenge his family and save his sister Nezuko who has turned into a demon.

title: Attack on Titan
description: Humanity fights for survival against giant humanoid Titans that threaten their existence.

title: One Piece
description: Follow Monkey D. Luffy and his Straw Hat Pirates in their search for the ultimate treasure, the One Piece.

title: My Hero Academia
description: In a world where superpowers are common, Izuku Midoriya dreams of becoming a hero despite being born without powers.

title: Death Note
description: A high school student discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing their name.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: Two brothers search for the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed alchemical experiment.

title: Naruto: Shippuden
description: Naruto Uzumaki continues his training to become the strongest ninja and protect his village.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
description: A college student becomes a half-ghoul after a transplant and must navigate the world of ghouls.

title: Sword Art Online
description: Players trapped in a virtual reality MMORPG must fight to survive and escape the game.

title: Bleach
description: Ichigo Kurosaki becomes a Soul Reaper and fights evil spirits to protect the living world.

title: Fairy Tail
description: A young wizard joins the Fairy Tail guild and embarks on magical adventures with his friends.

title: Hunter x Hunter
description: Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter and find his father, facing deadly challenges along the way.

title: Dragon Ball Z
description: Goku and his friends defend Earth from powerful villains in epic martial arts battles.

title: Steins;Gate
description: A group of friends discovers time travel and must prevent catastrophic changes to the timeline.

title: Code Geass
description: A prince with the power to control minds leads a rebellion against an oppressive empire.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
description: Teenage pilots battle mysterious beings called Angels to save humanity.

title: Psycho-Pass
description: In a future where crimes are predicted, inspectors enforce justice in a dystopian society.

title: Ergo Proxy
description: A detective investigates rogue androids in a decaying futuristic city.

title: Serial Experiments Lain
description: A girl explores the Wired, a virtual reality network that blurs the line between reality and the digital world.

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: Bounty hunters travel through space chasing criminals in a retro-futuristic setting.

title: Ghost in the Shell
description: A cyborg agent investigates a hacker who can hack human minds in a cyberpunk world.

title: Akira
description: In a post-apocalyptic Tokyo, a biker gang unleashes a powerful force that threatens the city.

title: Spirited Away
description: A young girl works in a magical bathhouse to save her parents who have been turned into pigs.

title: Your Name
description: Two teenagers mysteriously swap bodies and try to uncover the mystery behind their connection.

title: Weathering with You
description: A boy and a girl with weather-manipulating abilities navigate love and personal struggles in Tokyo.

title: A Silent Voice
description: A former bully seeks redemption by reconnecting with a girl he once tormented.

title: Violet Evergarden
description: A former child soldier works as an Auto Memory Doll, writing letters to help others express their feelings.

title: Made in Abyss
description: A girl and her robot companion explore the mysterious Abyss, a giant pit filled with ancient artifacts.

title: Re:Zero - Starting Life in Another World
description: A boy is transported to another world and must use his knowledge to survive deadly situations.

title: The Promised Neverland
description: Orphaned children discover the dark truth about their orphanage and plan an escape.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: A high school student joins a secret organization to fight cursed spirits using supernatural powers.
